content.text: Hi there! What kind of work do you do?
I am a doctor, and I love it. I get to help people every day.
That's amazing! I work for a newspaper, and I love telling stories.
What's your favorite kind of story to write?
I love writing about people who have overcome adversity. They inspire me.
That's a great answer. I think we all need to be inspired sometimes.
I agree. What's your favorite movie?
I love Titanic. It's so romantic.
I've never seen it. Is it really that good?
Oh, yes! You should definitely watch it.
Maybe I will. I'm always looking for something new to watch.
You won't be disappointed.
Good to know.
So, what's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love spending time with my family and pets. We go on a lot of hikes together.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I love hiking too.
Me too! It's a great way to get exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
I agree. It's also a great way to spend time with loved ones.
I'm glad we agree.
Me too.
